thread.title: NXH

author: NXH
title: NXH
text:
Purchased flowers for a friend after the passing of their father. It was super easy to order online - the hardest part was choosing which flowers to get! I was really impressed as I live in Aus, and the flowers needed to be delivered in Sweden - everything ran smoothly, and the flowers were delivered on the same day.
The flowers do look different than the picture but that was expected as it depended on what was in season/available at the florist. The flowers still looked lovely.
